name: Deadliest Catch
description:
A game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 41.

A 2 player competitive fishing/fighting game.

2 people stranded out at sea for months have finally had enough of each other.

Fish for anything you can use to defeat the other person.

Keyboard & Gamepard support.

This is a work in progress. Please leave any comments or criticisms!  Thank you!

@LifeAfterLunch
